alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:02AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD... NORTHEASTERN POINSETT...NORTHERN MISSISSIPPI AND WEST CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 AM CST... At 1002 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caraway, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Osceola, Gosnell, Manila, Leachville, Caraway, Luxora, Dell, Burdette, Ashport, Little River, Etowah, Black Oak, Victoria, Jolliff Store, Calumet, Dearman, Eastview, Lennie, and Vail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
